Title: Livin' La Vida Loca
Plot: Alice meets Papi, a girl who lights up on The Chart even more than Shane. Jenny is interviewed by a gay writer. Bette's new boss has some surprising news for her. After Helena's departure, a new guy takes the reins at the studio as Tina's new boss. Meanwhile, Max goes out on a date with a straight girl.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains drug use, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Alberto Davila Jr.,  James Michael Bobby,  Tristin Leffler,  Mark Krysko,  Nikki Boyer,  Shawn Ridout,  Peter Hanlon,  Rasika Mathur,  Matias  Hacker,  Chilton Crane,  Alex Rockhill,  Jessica Capshaw,  Lynn A. H
